title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted dark green silk ornamented with cut steel beads in a diamond repeat pattern.  An ornate steel ring controls side closing; steel band tassels at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-75.
